### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting and resource management
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate. Check inventory before initiating crafting processes to avoid running out of materials.
- Monitor the fuel levels in furnaces to maintain continuous operation.
